posts.message:
High-Level Competition (Kaggle) - Awesome prizes & more...!

During my master thesis, i was discovering deep learning (DL) concept and found out that Geoffrey Hinton (ML pioneer) is a professor at University of Toronto and also researcher at Google due to its distinguished work on DL, he always talks about how his PhD students can easily win kaggle competitions using DL

let's try going dirty and find out how real problems solve!!

References:
* Kaggle competitions (http://www.kaggle.com/competitions)
* Kaggle Ranking (http://www.kaggle.com/users)
* Hinton webpage (https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~hinton/)
* Hinton & Google (http://www.wired.com/wiredenterprise/2014/01/geoffrey-hinton-deep-learning/)

* Some stories and articles about Kaggle
http://blog.kaggle.com/2013/05/06/qa-with-job-salary-prediction-first-prize-winner-vlad-mnih/
http://blog.kaggle.com/2013/04/29/qa-with-vlado-boza-2nd-place-winner-job-salary-prediction-competition/
http://readwrite.com/2012/04/12/what-you-can-learn-from-kaggle#awesm=~ozhlOUbd1bMjHl
http://plotting-success.softwareadvice.com/who-are-the-kaggle-big-data-wizards-1013/

posts.description: Kaggle is a platform for data prediction competitions. Companies, organizations and researchers post their data and have it scrutinized by the world's best statisticians.

posts.message:
Are you working on a graduation project!
Have a project idea!
Want to create team!
Can't manage a timeline!

Don't worry; Give us that responsibility, let us to rearrange your thought.
You are invited to our FREE session "Project Management" on Monday 30th March 2014 in AAST Cairo.

Learn how to manage your project in a professional way.

Register Now @ http://foe.pitechnologies.net/
posts.caption: Project Management Session
posts.description:
For all students who:
- Are working on a graduation project
- Have a project idea 
- Want to create team
- Can't manage a timeline 
=======================================
HURRY UP!!! & register for the session @ http://www.foe.pitechnologies.net/index.php#register
=======================================
IEEE AAST Cairo-SB in a partnership with @[168795867986:274:PiTechnologies] ICT company is pleased to invite you to our FREE session "Project Management" to present the most common problems facing students managing their projects to its final output. A professional trainer from Pitecnologies will conduct the session discussing the main points to manage your project in a professional way through:
* Team work
* Time management
* project marketing 
* Planning & meetings
* Tasks distribution 
and more...
=====================================
whatever your academic year or your major is, you are welcome to attend since it is an general session that meets every student needs to get a project done successfully.
=======================================
The session will be held in
------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Arab Academy for Science, Technology and Maritime transportation Cairo campus in sheraton heliopolis 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enginnering building (A)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dr. Gamal Mokhtar hall  
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Date: Sunday 30th March 2014 @ 12:00 pm 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Don't forget to register and check your e-mail to get your confirmation code.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hope to see you there :)

posts.caption: tessel.io
posts.description: Tessel is a microcontroller that runs JavaScript. It's Node-compatible and ships with Wifi built in. Use it to easily make physical devices that connect to the web.
